footer.text: Character Guide • Playstyle: Nahida | Update Date: 12/28/2022 | Editor: Ultimate Noob#2955

description:
Nahida | Playstyle

Nahida is a Dendro Catalyst character whose kit offers 
- Strong and constant Dendro application from both on-field and off-field.
- Good personal damage.
- Up to a massive 250 EM buff for the on-field character which significantly increases reaction damage.

Her strong and consistant Dendro application from her Elemental Skill makes her the best option in all Dendro-based reaction teams. 

Playstyles
> Off-Field 
> Nahida can trigger her Tri-Karma Purification from off-field which can apply Dendro periodically and enabling reactions for on-field teamates.

> On-Field 
> Nahida can use her Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, and Tri-Karma Purification from her Skill to constantly apply Dendro and trigger/enable reactions.
title: Nahida | Playstyle
